text.name: Begone...
text.desc:
[StartBattle] On self and 1 ally with the highest max HP: consume up to 20 [BloodDinner] and apply 1 [BloomingThornsRodionFirst] for every 10 [BloodDinner] this unit consumed (2 times per turn)
- Prioritizes <Bloodfiend> allies
- If the affected ally is a <Bloodfiend>, this unit applies 1 additional [BloomingThornsRodionFirst]
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain 5 [Laceration]

text.name: Begone...
text.desc:
[StartBattle] On self and 1 ally with the highest max HP: consume up to 20 [BloodDinner] and apply 1 [BloomingThornsRodionFirst] for every 10 [BloodDinner] this unit consumed (2 times per turn)
- Prioritizes <Bloodfiend> allies
- If the affected ally is a <Bloodfiend>, this unit applies 1 additional [BloomingThornsRodionFirst]
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain 5 [Laceration]
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1

text.name: Begone...

text.name: In Finely Ground Mistfall
text.desc:
[StartBattle] On self and 1 ally with the least max HP: apply 1 [Enhancement], consume up to 30 [BloodDinner] and apply 1 [BloomingThornsRodionFirst] for every 10 [BloodDinner] this unit consumed (2 times per turn)
- Prioritizes <Bloodfiend> allies
- If the affected ally is a <Bloodfiend>, this unit applies additional 1 [Enhancement] and 2 [BloomingThornsRodionFirst]
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain 5 [Laceration]

text.name: The Festival Will End
text.desc:
[BeforeUse] At 25+ [BloomingThornsRodionFirst], activate 'Ascendant Don Quixote Hardblood[TabExplain] Arts - The Finale' instead
[WhenUse] To self and (highest Reson.) allies: apply (3 + (1 for every 50 [BloodDinner_Accumulation] by this unit) [FestivalFeverRodion] this turn and next turn (max 10)
[WhenUse] To self and (highest Reson.) allies: apply 3 [BloomingThornsRodionFirst]

text.name: The Festival Will End
text.desc:
[BeforeUse] At 25+ [BloomingThornsRodionFirst], activate 'Ascendant Don Quixote Hardblood[TabExplain] Arts - The Finale' instead
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] To self and (highest Reson.) allies: apply (3 + (1 for every 50 [BloodDinner_Accumulation] by this unit) [FestivalFeverRodion] this turn and next turn (max 10)
[WhenUse] To self and (highest Reson.) allies: apply 3 [BloomingThornsRodionFirst]

text.name: Ascendant Don Quixote Hardblood Arts - The Finale
text.desc:
[WhenUse] To self and (highest Reson.) allies: apply (5 + (1 for every 50 [BloodDinner_Accumulation] by this unit) [FestivalFeverRodion] this turn and next turn (max 10)
[WhenUse] To self and (highest Reson.) allies: apply 5 [BloomingThornsRodionFirst]
[WhenUse] Deal +1% damage for every 5 [BloodDinner_Accumulation] by this unit (max 50%)
[EndSkill] Consume all [BloomingThornsRodionFirst] on self

text.name: Ascendant Don Quixote Hardblood Arts - The Finale
text.desc:
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] To self and (highest Reson.) allies: apply (5 + (1 for every 50 [BloodDinner_Accumulation] by this unit) [FestivalFeverRodion] this turn and next turn (max 10)

text.name: Don Quixote Hardblood Arts 15: Parasol
text.desc:
[DuelCounter]
[WhenUse] Reduce [Laceration] Count by 3 for 2 other allies with the highest ([Laceration] Potency x Count) value, and increase [BloodDinner] by (pre-reduction [Laceration] Potency x Count reduced)
  - If this effect reduces [Laceration] Count to 0, [Laceration] expires
[WinDuel] Gain 4 [BloomingThornsRodionFirst]

text.name: Don Quixote Hardblood Arts 15: Parasol
text.desc:
[DuelCounter]
[WhenUse] Reduce [Laceration] Count by 3 for 2 other allies with the highest ([Laceration] Potency x Count) value, and increase [BloodDinner] by (pre-reduction [Laceration] Potency x Count reduced)
  - If this effect reduces [Laceration] Count to 0, [Laceration] expires
<style="highlight">  - If the affected ally is a <Bloodfiend>, reduce their [Laceration] Count by 2 more
[WinDuel] Gain 4 [BloomingThornsRodionFirst]

1091121.name: "Blossom with Blood..."
1091121.desc: To 1 ally with the highest [Laceration] Potency at Turn End: reduce the ally's [Laceration] Potency by 6 max, and apply (Bleed Potency reduced / 2) [BloomingThornsRodionFirst] (rounded down)

1091101.name: Hardblood Thorn
1091101.desc:
When an other ally takes [Laceration] damage or consumes [BloodDinner], gain 1 [BloomingThornsRodionFirst] (3 times per turn)
Heal HP on self by 20% of the damage dealt with base Skills (max 10 per Skill)

1091102.name: Bloodfeast
1091102.desc:
If this unit is on field, or is one of the units that can appear on this Stage, increase [BloodDinner] value by the amount of [Laceration] damage collectively received by every unit. 
When this unit enters the field, the sleeping blood drenching the battlefield will fill the surface.

1091111.name: Hardblood Thorn
1091111.desc:
When an other ally takes [Laceration] damage or consumes [BloodDinner], this unit gains 1 [BloomingThornsRodionFirst] (5 times per turn)
Heal HP on self by 20% of the damage dealt with base Skills (max 10 per Skill)
- At max HP, heal 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage by excess healing
